name: Pongimize
description:
A Pong game that can be customised with different colors!

 Bored of the old Pong game?  Then this is a game for you!
Customize the game according to your wish - Change colors of objects Grab one of your friends to play.  Don't have a friend? - dont worry!    Pongimize comes with an AI system that can play against you!
